list.description:
~HISTORICAL T-72M2 MODERNA SIGHT~
For 4k, 1440p and 1080p

The T-72M2 Moderna uses the Fotona TIGS (Thermal Imaging Gunner's Sight) and a TPD-K1 backup sight. The reference image for this sight is taken from the Fotona STIGS sight, which uses the same display/monitor as the TIGS.

The correct field of view is applied (5.4x9.2°), but the in-game magnification is taken from the TPD-K1 (8x), instead of the Fotona TIGS variable magnification (somewhere around 4x-16x) so the lower text won't be visible by default (since it's supposed to be zoomed out more), you have to look down...

#collimator #sight #planes #aircraft #Sweden #a21 #a21a3 #j21a1 #j21a2 #j21 #rockets

Update 11-9-25: Corrected missing asterisk on J21 gunsight file

Gun and rocket sight for the Swedish A21A-3, A21A-1, and J21A-2. Only M/49B rockets are sighted, although other *might* work.

To aim M/49B rockets Dive shallow at 10-15 degrees and use the main boxes to aim rockets at 600m when IAS is above 450kmh. If IAS is below 360kmh, use the lower aiming section (Only sighted for close range). If IAS is higher than 550kmh, use the section just below the gun reticle. If coming in for a Top att...

Ashley from "Coffin of Andy and Leyley"

How to install:
-Create UserSights folder in your folder with installed WT
-Open folder "all_tanks"
-Copy everything from zip file to that folder
-Restart the game or launch it
-Go to Options -> Main -> Ground vehicle Battle Settings -> Sight settings
-Find "Redicle" on the right
-Switch Default grid sight to one of the custom sights.
-Cry about it

#sight #collimator #planes #aircraft #US #USA #A2D #A2D1 #HVAR #rockets #gunsight

Update 2-14-25: Reformatted to use BiCubic MipMaps without error/gamma correction. This will provide superior clarity, especially on lower resolutions.

Rocket and gunsight collimator for the A2D-1 SkyShark. The gunsight is good for 600-2000m, and the dotted lines coming from the sides provide accurate single-gun fire at distances below 600m by following the path of the guns.

ROCKET AIMING IS WEIRD FOR THE A2D!!!! The boxes down low are for left and right wing close (300m or less) launches. TILTING A WIN...

HISTORICAL LVRBV 701 SIGHT
Works for 1080p

Sight is based off of demonstration footage for the RBS 70 SAM.
Has 2 available sights. One is without the lines, the other with the lines.

Source: https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1EtkM7Nk5uXVM5sspVnTnxeF-cTdfg8ysaxZv1L5S7o0/edit#gid=1884391294 (This time I found the footage and provided the images! Hooray me!)

#realistic #historical #sight #lvrbv701 #lvrbv_701

#bocchi_the_rock #anime

#ztz99_ii #ztz99iii #mbt2000

CN - ZTZ99II / III /MBT2000 Sight

Zoom :
ZTZ99 : 6.0x - 11.0x
MBT2000 : 3.0x - 10.0x

Usage method : Put the. blk file in the folder of the vehicle，Restart the game，Select a custom sight in Game Options - General Combat Settings
Example : E:\SteamLibrary\steamapps\common\War Thunder\UserSights\cn_ztz_99

使用说明 : 把.blk文件放到对应载具的文件夹内，重启游戏或重新加载自定义瞄具，在游戏选项-通用战斗设置中选择自定义瞄具。
例 : E:\SteamLibrary\steamapps\common\War Thunder\UserSights\cn_ztz_99

Universal EOTech XPS2-0 (Single Dot Reticle)

Self-explanatory

Recommended to use this sight for MBTs with LRF
Not Suitable for tanks without LRF

This sight is VERY VERY VERY compact without any of the clutter, it is made with precision shooting and weakspot sniping in mind due to its extremely fine dot and the small halo ring but also a fast target acquisition at close ranges.

Feel free to reuse this sight and modify however you want and republish modified versions of it, who knows that I might even like yours more and use yours instead :>

Drop the sigh...

#universal

The next rendition of my series of simple sights - now at version 3! This series of sights was created as I could not find any similar sights. This version adds circles to the main sight so that vehicles with large differences in zoom can still accurately place shots when zoomed in. It also adds documentation to various aspects of the sight coding (as far as I know they are accurate). Sight illumination has been changed to orange for better viewability in thermals and low-light conditions.

The .zip file contains both a sight with a centre dot and one without a centre dot, for personal pref...

SIMPLIFIED EMES 15 SIGHT
Works for 1080p

Sight is based off of found images and real life images.
Sight works for every Leopard variant starting after the 2A4

Source: https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1EtkM7Nk5uXVM5sspVnTnxeF-cTdfg8ysaxZv1L5S7o0/edit#gid=1884391294
